abstract: Sanofi-Aventis got a big push Wednesday for a new drug for a potentially serious heart condition when a leading medical journal reported promising results from a clinical trial.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis got a big push Wednesday for a new drug for a potentially serious heart condition when a leading medical journal reported promising results from a clinical trial.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis got a big push Wednesday for a new drug for a potentially serious heart condition when a leading medical journal reported promising results from a clinical trial.

headline.main: Sanofi Drug Found Promising for Heart Ailment
headline.print_headline: Study Finds Sanofi Drug Promising for Heart Ailment
